inputs.label: Snyk API token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose your Snyk service connection from your Azure DevOps project settings.

inputs.name: dockerImageName
inputs.label: Container Image Name

inputs.name: dockerfilePath
inputs.label: Path to Dockerfile
